channel.title: How do u make ur own shops (since tutorials link isnt working)
channel.description:
I want to add a shop that sells tzhaar items..
I added him to autospawn Made him a WannieShop Added him to shop.cfg
What now.. when i trade him it crashes server.. How do i fix dat?

item.title: How do u make ur own shops (since tutorials link isnt working)
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

This is what i made the shopkeep

In Shops.cfg

shop = 41	Tzhaar_Shop						2	2	6522	10	6523	10	6524	10	6525	10	6526	10	6527	10	6528	10	6568	10

In autoSpawn:

spawn = 2621	3202	3424	0	0	0	0	0	2	NewNPC

This in Client:

} else if (NPCID == 2621) { //TzHaar Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //TzHaar-Hur-Koz

Tell me if i did anything rong pls. cuz when i trade him, it freezes

Read full topic
